trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance to the specified type.
<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.XamlIntegration.VisualBasicSettingsConverter> facilitates the deserialization of Visual Basic expressions from XAML.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.XamlIntegration.VisualBasicSettingsConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance.

If `sourceType` is a <xref:System.String>, this method returns `true`; otherwise, the determination is made by calling the base class method <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>.
Context information that is used for conversion.
The type to convert from.
`true` if the specified type can be converted from; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance can be converted into an instance of the specified type.

This method returns `false` if the `destinationType` is a <xref:System.String>; otherwise, the determination is made by calling the base class method <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertTo%2A>.
Context information that is used for conversion.
The type to convert to.
`true` if a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance can be converted to an instance of the specified type; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the specified object to a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance.
The conversion is made by calling the base class method <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>.
If the conversion cannot be made, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
Context information that is used for conversion.
An optional <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref>.
If not supplied, the current culture is assumed.
The object to convert.
An object that represents the converted value.
Converts a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance to the specified type.
The conversion is made by calling the base class method <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>.
If the conversion cannot be made, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
Context information that is used for conversion.
An optional <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref>.
If not supplied, the current culture is assumed.
The <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance to convert.
The type to convert to.
The converted value.
